items.title: Spotify Allowing AI-Generated Songs on Dead Artists’ Pages: Report
items.summary: Spotify is facing criticism for allowing AI-generated songs to be added to the artist pages of deceased musicians, raising concerns about the ethics of using technology to create new content after an artist has passed away.
